class.name: minestar.mine.domain.minemodel.underground.drawpoint.DrawPointStatus
class.meta: A standard description of the status of a draw point.

property.name: id
property.meta: The unique, system-assigned identifier for this status.

property.name: active
property.meta: Whether this status is active or archived. (This flag is '1' if it is active and '0' if archived.)

property.name: code
property.meta: The short, coded textual representation of this status.

property.name: description
property.meta: The longer, more descriptive text for this status.

property.name: closed
property.meta: Whether this status indicates that a draw point is temporarily closed. (This flag is '1' if it represents a temporarily closed draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: hungUp
property.meta: Whether this status indicates that a draw point is hung up. (This flag is '1' if it represents a hung up draw point and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: wetMuck
property.meta: Whether the status indicates that a draw point has wet muck conditions. (This flag is '1' if it represents wet muck conditions and '0' if it does not.)

property.name: displayColorRed
property.meta: The red value of the background color used to represent this status.

property.name: displayColorGreen
property.meta: The green value of the background color used to represent this status.

property.name: displayColorBlue
property.meta: The blue value of the background color used to represent this status.
